about_me.title: About me
about_me.description1: I am a Frontend Developer from Kamen, Germany. After my studies in economics and my experiences in accounting, I combine my logical thinking with coding skills. This is how I bring value to each team.
about_me.description2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

skills.title: My skills
skills.learn_text_prefix: Don't see the skill you need?

portfolio.description:
Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with
projects to see my skills in action.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

entventure.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help the Ent to collect coins and pinecones to fight against the orks.

pokèdex.description: Based on the PokéApi, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokemon information.

references.title: References
references.intro_text: I thrive both independently and as part of a team. Here's what my colleagues have to say about working with me

comments.comment_person1_text: Jennifer's problem-solving ability and attention to detail were key to our success. I highly recommend working with her.
comments.comment_person2_text: Jennifer is always willing to help out and tackle any challenge. Her dedication and team spirit made a huge impact on the project.
comments.comment_person3_text: Jennifer always gets the job done right. Her reliability and commitment make them an invaluable team member.
